import { Playground, Props } from 'docz'
import {Button, Flex, useTheme} from '../index'

<Playground>
{() => {
    const theme = useTheme()
    return (
      <>
        <Button onPress={() => theme.alert({type: 'success', message: 'iam a alert'})}>Alert</Button>  
      </>
    )
  }}
    
</Playground>
